entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
